sentences.en: A hubbub was heard in the courtyard.
After a few minutes, rang a hubbub.
sentences.cn: 几分钟之后, 响起了一阵吵闹声.

sentences.en: At lunchtime, a pleasant hubbub of voices fills the museum's cafeteria.
sentences.cn: 午餐时刻, 博物馆的餐厅里洋溢着一片愉快的嘈杂声.

sentences.en: At the free market, the peddlers make a hubbub of noise.
sentences.cn: 自由市场上, 小贩的喧叫声一片.
闹声渐渐地平静下来,秩序终于恢复了.

sentences.en: In all the hubbub over the election, one might be excused for missing yesterday's announcement.
sentences.cn: 在选举造成的一片混乱中，没有听到昨天的公告也是情有可原的。

sentences.en: In the hubbub of city life, it is hard for us to imagine the people and the things of the past, and how indeed these people felt about the world.
sentences.cn: 天天生活在城市里的我们很难想像过去的人,过去的事, 过去的年代与感觉.

sentences.en: In work near cities the hubbub of traffic and industry produces additional ground vibrations.
sentences.cn: 在城镇附近工作时,交通和工业的骚扰增加了大地的振动.

sentences.en: It was difficult to hear what he was saying over the hubbub.
sentences.cn: 声音太嘈杂，难以听清楚他的讲话。

sentences.en: Only occasionally a hubbub of altercation rises to the skies.
sentences.cn: 只是偶然发生口角,大声地吵闹.

sentences.en: Small failures are lost in the hubbub.
sentences.cn: 小故障被掩盖在喧哗之中.

sentences.en: The hubbub of voices drowned out the host's voice.
sentences.cn: 嘈杂的声音淹没了主人的声音。

sentences.en: There arose a hubbub among them.
There was a hubbub of excited conversation from over a thousand people.
sentences.cn: 有一千多人在兴高采烈地大声谈话，场面无比喧闹。

trans.tran_en: a mixture of loud noises, especially the noise of a lot of people talking at the same time
